content: the pdf file contains 2 pages with the pattern for the fingerless mitts on page 1 and the cowl on page 2 enjoy **wildflower fingerless mitts** by diane augustin designed and crocheted for knitting from the heart minnesota yarn shop hop 2025 welcome to the 2025 mn yarn shop hop the theme this year is in the garden these crocheted fingerless mitts are part of the wildflowers theme selected by knitting from the heart we hope you enjoy the pattern and the hop thank you for your incredible generosity in donations for area food shelves **materials** one skein 138 yards/125 grams aran weight 100% superwash merino by trippin with dixie signature yarn for knitting from the heart for the minnesota yarn shop hop size h 8 5mm crochet hook locking stitch markers yarn needle **pattern notes** pattern will begin with a strip of ribbing at the wrist after joining the last row to the first stitches are picked up around the top edge of the ribbing the mitts are crocheted in a spiral keep track of the beginning of the rounds by placing a locking stitch marker into the first stitch of the first round and moving it into the first stitch of each subsequent round increases for the thumb gusset are made on each side of the marker size 7 in circumference at the wrist and hand 8 in length from wrist edge to finger edge gauge is 3 sts /in and 3 row/in **wildflower cowl** by diane augustin minnesota yarn shop hop 2025 materials one skein 138 yards/125 grams aran weight 100% superwash merino by trippin with dixie signature yarn for knitting from the heart for the minnesota yarn shop hop size h 8 5mm crochet hook locking stitch markers yarn needle **pattern notes** the cowl begins with a strip of ribbing after joining the last row to the first stitches are picked up around the top edge of the ribbing for the body of the cowl the cowl is crocheted in a spiral keep track of the beginning of the rounds by placing a locking stitch marker into the first stitch of the first round and replacing it into the first stitch of each subsequent round size 18 in circumference at the top 22 at the bottom fan edge 7 deep gauge is 3 sts /in and 3 row/in thank you to ginny and diane for modeling enjoy
